name: adhdgofly-plugin
description: ADHDGoFly - 智能阅读助手浏览器插件

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run sync-version
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run sync-version
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run sync-version
scripts.sync-version: node -e "const pkg = require('./package.json'); const manifest = require('./manifest.json'); manifest.version = pkg.version; require('fs').writeFileSync('manifest.json', JSON.stringify(manifest, null, 2));"
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo '✅ 构建完成，可以推送到 GitHub 进行 Cloudflare Pages 部署'

author: ADHDGoFly Team
